Posts.EditableText:
Thought I'd have an official "just starting" thread, for the sake of it really. Even though I'm not really just starting. Anyway. Hi, how are you? Had a good day?

Some of you (alright, one of you) might know that I'm usually associated with Adrift as far as writing IF goes, but I'd like to know the benefits of other options, and here seems as good a place to start as any.

Peace out

Sprite x x

Posts.EditableText:
"being so careful"

I'm sure there's a hidden message in there. Let's see:

[b:3v7u96n1]being[/b:3v7u96n1]: bee - kind of flying insect
[b:3v7u96n1]so[/b:3v7u96n1]: clear mispelling of sew
[b:3v7u96n1]careful[/b:3v7u96n1]: sounds like a car full of something

A-ha! Got it!

You want to sew flying insects into my car until it's full!

See, WW? You're not the only one who can decipher the hidden content in seemingly innocent statements!

Mods! Ban her!
